The old vvaye A sermon preached at Oxford, the eight day of Iuly, being the Act Sunday. 1610. By Robert Abbott ... Abbot, Robert, 1560-1618.
[12], 59, [1] p.
Printed [by W. Stansby] for Eleazar Edgar, and Ambrose Garbrand, and are to bee solde at their shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Wind-mill, London : 1610.
Printer's name from STC. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
